entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
